title: Update About Me experience to 8+ years

requirements.text: Update the About Me section text to reflect "8+ years" of experience by replacing the current "6+ years" wording in frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutSection.tsx.

quotes: Change experience in about me with 8+ years

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutSection.tsx, the first paragraph under "About Me" says "8+ years" (not "6+ years").
No other About Me wording, layout, styles, or animations are changed aside from the experience number update.
The About section renders successfully with no TypeScript/React build errors.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components); compose them only.
Do not modify frontend immutable hook/bootstrap files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts).
Keep changes limited to the About section copy update; do not introduce backend dependencies.
nonGoals: Changing the Hero section experience label (already updated elsewhere).
Adding new sections, navigation items, or redesigning the About section layout.
Any backend changes or persistence for portfolio content.
